actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to protect Federal mine inspectors in the performance of their official responsibilities.

summary.text: Expands the protection of officers and employees of the United States by imposing criminal penalties on any person who kills any officer or employee of the Department of Interior designated by the Secretary of the Interior to enforce any Act of Congress to protect and promote the health and safety of persons working in coal, metal, or nonmetallic mines. (Amends 18 U.S.C. 1114)

titles.title: A bill to protect Federal mine inspectors in the performance of their official responsibilities.
